paper_abstract: The notion of intersectional soft q-ideals and a-ideals of a BCI-algebra are introduced, and some related properties are investigated. We show that given a subalgebra A of a BCI-algebra X, an intersectional A-soft set F-A over U is an intersectional A-soft a-ideal over U if and only if it is both an intersectional A-soft p-ideal over U and an intersectional A-soft q-ideal over U.
paper_title: Applications of soft sets to q-ideals and a-ideals in BCI-algebras
